If either day falls on a holiday or weekend, pay will be deposited the working day prior to the 15\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"th\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-superscript\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or last day of the month.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"DIRECT DEPOSIT\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"All employees are eligible for direct deposit of their payroll checks. Direct deposit is the automatic deposit of your pay into the financial institution account(s) of your choice. The Company retains the right to correct/submit/withdraw any funds that are deposited incorrectly in an employee's account through the direct deposit program. If you notice an error in your payroll, you must immediately notify \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"mailto:WFAPayrollUS@epam.com\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"WFA Payroll US\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\".\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-2\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"REVIEWING YOUR PAYROLL INFORMATION\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"By registering with\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Primepoint EmployeeXperience\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", you have the ability to review and print your paycheck stubs, review and print your annual W2's, verify your deductions, update your home address and change your federal W-4 election.
